subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Heat rookie Michael Beasley, who entered Saturday night’s win against the Nets averaging 13.8 points and 5 rebounds a game, is Miami’s second leading scorer behind Dwyane Wade.
snippet: Heat rookie Michael Beasley, who entered Saturday night’s win against the Nets averaging 13.8 points and 5 rebounds a game, is Miami’s second leading scorer behind Dwyane Wade.
